net.consensys.cava.crypto

Class SECP256K1

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.crypto.SECP256K1

  • public final class SECP256K1
extends java.lang.Object
    An Elliptic Curve Digital Signature using parameters as used by Bitcoin, and defined in Standards for Efficient Cryptography (SEC) (Certicom Research, http://www.secg.org/sec2-v2.pdf).

    This class depends upon the BouncyCastle library being available and added as a Provider. See https://www.bouncycastle.org/wiki/display/JA1/Provider+Installation.

    BouncyCastle can be included using the gradle dependency 'org.bouncycastle:bcprov-jdk15on'.

      static class  SECP256K1.SecretKey
      A SECP256K1 private key.
      static class  SECP256K1.Signature
      A SECP256K1 digital signature.
